item.title: About
item.description: All about me He has been working for HCL Technologies, a global IT services company, providing high quality technical services as a Senior IT Analyst. His contribution resulted in new services and high profits for the company. He is a leader of a team responsible for data analysis and creating reports in order to improve the global performance of the project. He has become a trusted team member who provides regular pro-active input towards increasing productivity.
